extension.description: What initially started as a mod of Aeon Nox has evolved into a full skin of its own. Breeze has been designed as an alternative to the commonly found dark themes, a light and airy experience.[CR][CR]Inspiration has been taken from a mix of other skins and so I would like to recognise and thank the following...[CR][CR]Big Noid and Aeon Nox - The foundation of the skin.[CR]Amra/Stoli and Metropolis[CR]Hitcher/Arcanthur and Precession[CR]Black and Xperience1080
